verses.roman:
guṇḍicāte nṛtya-ante kaila jala-keli
herā-pañcamīte dekhila lakṣmī-devīra kelī

synonyms: guṇḍicāte—in the neighborhood of the Guṇḍicā temple; nṛtya-ante—after dancing; kaila—performed; jala-keli—sporting in the water; herā-pañcamīte—on the day of Herā-pañcamī; dekhila—saw; lakṣmī-devīra—of the goddess of fortune; kelī—activities.
translation: After dancing in the Guṇḍicā temple, the Lord sported in the water with His devotees, and on Herā-pañcamī day they all saw the activities of the goddess of fortune, Lakṣmīdevī.
